indicator_description: Proportion of solid waste collected out of total solid waste generated by the city. Please specify  per category of waste (municipal/non-municipal, hazardous/non-hazardous, including through waste drop-off facilities for non-municipal), if possible.
Percentage of population with regular municipal solid waste collection service (at least once a week) (Please disaggregate by sex, age and groups in vulnerable situation, if possible)
Main method(s) used for pre-treatment (specify percentage, if available).
For collection and for treatment, what maintenance and monitoring measures are applied? [+]
Remaining useful life of the site where the landfill is located (in years, based on capacity and municipal solid waste generation projections).
Percentage of households connected to a wastewater network
Proportion of wastewater that is safely treated
Is regular sampling of wastewater discharge for compliance with water quality standards being conducted in the city?
Percentage of urban area covered by stormwater collection system
Is the city's drainage system currently able to cope with seasonal increase in rain/stormwater?
Is the city reusing rainwater collected stormwater and/or reclaimed water?
What monitoring and maintenance measures are applied?
Do zoning rules, building codes and standards that address water sensitive urban design and/or onsite stormwater solutions exist, are widely applied, properly enforced and verified?
